name: Chapped
description:
Guide Greg to stretch his neck in different directions as he tries to get all the chap-sticks that the local shipping company, Saharazon, has spilled all over the place! 

A short platformer style game with a twist! Follow Greg as he worries about his lips staying dry in this drought like summer!

Playtime 10mins - 5lvls

Controls: 

WASD - MOVE

 SPACE - JUMP

 More Instructions to come in the game.

Released : 3/1/2020
